cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to -1 (negative value) will cause PLMN configuration errors and prevent cell identification.

du.explanation_en: Setting prach_ConfigurationIndex to 200 (exceeds maximum allowed value) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent PRACH setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 prach_ConfigurationIndex 設定為 200（超過最大允許值）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 PRACH 設定。
